extendedInfo.description: ======================================IMPORTANT: CLZ Comics is NOT a stand-alone app!This is an add-on for Comic Collector for PC or Mac.(available for $29.95 here: http://www.collectorz.com/comic/ )You need Comic Collector to catalog your comic collection and EXPORT data and images to this CLZ Comics for Android.** Without Comic Collector, this app is useless! **======================================Are you using Collectorz.com's Comic Collector to catalog your comic book collection?Then CLZ Comics is a great companion, to browse, sort andsearch your comic collection (and your wish list!) on your Android device.Just use the Export to CLZ Comics feature in Comic Collector toexport your existing database (including images) to this Android app.Features:* Import your collection data and images from the Windows or Mac edition  - Use Wi-Fi to transfer directly from Windows or Mac to your iPhone.  - Or: Or: Export to a file in the Win/Mac version, then copy the file to      your Android's SD card.* Browse your In Collection items, your Wish List, or your entire database,   using the 3 main tabs on the top left: All, Collection, Wish List* View your comic lists in 2 different views:  - List : showing a small cover, series, issue number and collection status.  - Thumbnail Wall: just cover image thumbnails, but lots of em.* Sort your comic lists by Issue Number, asc. or desc.* Search your database by Series, Title, Barcode, Creator or Character* Group your items into folders. Choose from:    Series, Publisher, Imprint, Rating, Location, Condition, Tag.* Tap a comic in any view to go to the Issue Details page:  - Cover image, creator and character lists and your personal information.  - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next comic, or just swipe.  - Shake iPhone to go to a random comic in your current list.  - Choose from 4 styles: Blue, Black, Light Blue, White* Tap small cover image on Details Page to go the Large Cover Page:	- Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next comic, or just swipe.	- Tap the image to return to Details Page.* Supports Portrait and Landscape modes in all views and pages.REQUIREMENTS:- Comic Collector 4.7 for Windows or later. or- Comic Collector 5.0 for Mac OS X (or newer)RECOMMENDED (needed to transfer data over Wi-Fi):- Wi-Fi connection to the same local network that your desktop computer is in.- Apple Bonjour service.

reviews.comment: This app is pure garbage. My device meets all of the requirements but can\'t link wirelessly and won\'t even read the file I saved directly to my sd card. In fact all it does is show me the sample collection. Pure garbage and a ripoff at $4.99. Unless support helps me soon I will demand a refund.
reviews.author: Kevin Allen

reviews.title: Needs updating ability on phone.
reviews.comment: I would give this App. a 5star rating if only you could update on your phone...not just on the computer and push to the phone. Otherwise a great app for organizing one\'s comic collection.
reviews.author: M. Peterson

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Viewing my collection looks great with this app. Also gives me a chance to easily look at my wish list when I am in a comic shop. I do hope that this app will have the same full feature as the desktop version.
reviews.author: Edward Sy

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: I seriously love this app. The desktop version is great also. This app allows me to view my catalog while shopping for new comics.
reviews.author: Brent Pierce

reviews.title: Not happy so far...still not happy...
reviews.comment: Unable to import my collection. Will check online for some help. And then revise my rating accordingly...have to import my collection manually via a file.  It rarely ever can import/update wirelessly.  (while the version on my Ipad always updates flawlessly).  Recently, when i try to open the program instead of opening i get a mesg that says that the app has stopped unexpectedly and will close.    The android version needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Becoming more and more unhappy
reviews.comment: I have become more and more unhappy with this app. It used to take a long time to synch wirelessly, then I had to synch via USB and now I can\'t synch at all. Given the incredible expense of this app plus its companion, I would expect a LOT more.
reviews.author: Tom Downey

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Only feature I\'d love to see included is \"Owner\" name for each issue. That way, using the app would be easier for me and my wife both! Otherwise, this thing rocks!
reviews.author: Robby D. Duncan

reviews.title: Cannot install  app on my ASUS MeMO Pad.
reviews.comment: I just got a new ASUS MeMO Pad that has Android 4.1.1. When I try to install app the pad says it could not be installed on USB or microSD card. What gives?????
reviews.author: William Maloney

reviews.comment: Is there support for jelly bean on the way? Bought tonight and it simply won\'t work.
reviews.author: Ryan Kwyzla

reviews.title: One if the best
reviews.comment: Awesome software. Never come home with doubles again and is the perfect companion to the desktop software
reviews.author: john warren

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Can\'t scan our upload from phone... Only thing good for is carrying around your collectorz inventory and wish list
reviews.author: Jason Ellis

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, just wish you could have cloud storage and update  Straight from the app.
reviews.author: Roy Williams

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Hoping they get the scanner built in like the iOS counterpart
reviews.author: Joshua Beaver

reviews.title: a geat program
reviews.comment: thanks
reviews.author: Daniel Wilson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: App works perfectly after last update. Hope more features added with future updates. Will upgrade to 5 stars when I can add from phone/tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Warning before you pay for this read
reviews.comment: This is what they posted on face book:  I am afraid that it is highly unlikely that the above features will ever be implemented for our Android apps. Mainly because the number of app being sold on Android is still lagging way behind iOS (iOS is generating more twice as many app sales). Even with the current iOS and Android apps having the exact same functionality\342\200\246  Yes, we are aware that Android is more popular than iOS, in terms of devices sold. But what counts for us, as software developers, is app sales not device sales. And that is were Android is not doing so well. Many app developers like us see the same effects. We can only guess at the reasons. Maybe Android users are less willing to pay for apps? Maybe many Android devices are in the hands of people who just wanted a cheap phone and are not even aware it runs Android and can run apps? I don\342\200\231t know, and it doesn\342\200\231t matter really. The numbers are what counts here.  Until this changes (which is unlikely because it has been like this for years), we simply cannot afford to spend more development time and money on Android. We just have to focus on the market where the most app buyers are. Sorry\342\200\246
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantstic
reviews.comment: Great app, does exactly what it says. Took me two minutes to install and import my sizable collection from Comic Collector 5.3 down to my Samsung Gallaxy SII. Image transitions are very smooth and all the view filters I hoped for are available. Strongly recommend to any user of the standard software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, needs a little polish.
reviews.comment: I love this app, I love shopping for books with it. If you gets this you definitely need to buy clz buddy app as well. It helps you scan in comics for input. The only reason I give this 4 stars is because it would better if the buddy and the comic app were combined to 1. Although the buddy app works with all different collections.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Decent app.  Doesn\'t capture key info, ie quantity and multiple copies and their locations.  So it isn\'t as reliable of a mobile version of clz comic software as it should be since it\'s not a free extension.  Definitely needs improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem crashing.
reviews.comment: Latest update sucks.  Won\'t show new covers.  Counts them but won\'t display them.  If you look up books by the cover, you can\'t see the newer ones.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User
